article.Heading: Here's what to expect from Budget for gems and jewellery space
article.Summary: Watch Manisha Gupta of CNBC-TV18 speaking about the expectations from the Budget for the gems and jewellery space.
article.Body:
Watch Manisha Gupta of CNBC-TV18 speaking about the expectations from the Budget for the gems and jewellery space.

Also watch Praveen Shankar Pandya, Chairman of GJEPC talk about his expectations from goods and services tax (GST) and Budget.
